template.name: Template SNMP ReadyNAS Tega
template.description: For Netgear Ready NAS http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/ReadyNAS/READYNAS-MIB.txt Template is used for monitoring of the disks state, disks temperature, a status of volumes and general state device. Calculated value can be unavailable the some time

item_prototype.name: Disk $1 status digital
item_prototype.description: The disk status in digital format. "1" the disk is status "ok"

item_prototype.name: Disk $1 temperature
item_prototype.description: The data received from the device. Original data are obtained in Fahrenheit.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISKNUMBER} status change
trigger_prototype.description: If the previous status was "ok" and became non-"ok"

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISKNUMBER} temperature celsius high! More that {$TEMPERATURE_DISK_C_HIGH_TSRNT}

trigger.name: data isn't recieved over SNMP ReadyNAS extended
trigger.description: Если нет расширенных данных по SNMP
